page.title: 07THE PETWOOD HOTEL
page.content: THE PETWOOD HOTEL IS BEAUTIFULLY SITUATED IN 42 ACRES OF WOODLAND.THE PETWOOD WAS BUILT IN 1905 AND WAS USED AS A OFFICERS MESS FOR THE DAMBUSTERS <SQN 617> IN THE SECOND WORLD WAR.THE PETWOOD NEEDS VARIOUS LICENCES TO SELL LIQUOR.THIS HOTEL OFFFERS A RESTUARANT 2 BARS,A SNOOKER ROOM, AND 5 CONFERENCE ROOMS.MANY GOLFERS STAY AT THE PETWOOD AND SOMETIMES SOME FORIEGNERS AND BUSINESSMEN STAY HERE.THE PETWOOD ADVERTISES IN THE NEWSPAPERS OF NEIGHBOURING COUNTIES.THIS HOTEL IS SET IN WOODHALL SPA IN THE HEART OF LINCOLNSHIRE.THE PETWOOD IS CERTAINLY A NICE PLACE TO STAY IN.
